24 template <typename VoxelType>
25 Layer<VoxelType>::Layer(const LayerProto& proto)
26  : voxel_size_(proto.voxel_size()),
27  voxels_per_side_(proto.voxels_per_side()) {
28  CHECK_EQ(getType().compare(proto.type()), 0)
29  << "Incorrect voxel type, proto type: " << proto.type()
30  << " layer type: " << getType();
31 
32  // Derived config parameter.
33  CHECK_GT(proto.voxel_size(), 0.0);
34  block_size_ = voxel_size_ * voxels_per_side_;
35  CHECK_GT(block_size_, 0.0);
36  block_size_inv_ = 1.0 / block_size_;
37  CHECK_GT(proto.voxels_per_side(), 0u);
38  voxels_per_side_inv_ = 1.0f / static_cast<FloatingPoint>(voxels_per_side_);
39 }
40 
41 template <typename VoxelType>
42 void Layer<VoxelType>::getProto(LayerProto* proto) const {
43  CHECK_NOTNULL(proto);
44 
45  CHECK_NE(getType().compare(voxel_types::kNotSerializable), 0)
46  << "The voxel type of this layer is not serializable!";
47 
48  proto->set_voxel_size(voxel_size_);
49  proto->set_voxels_per_side(voxels_per_side_);
50  proto->set_type(getType());
51 }
52 
53 template <typename VoxelType>
54 Layer<VoxelType>::Layer(const Layer& other) {
55  voxel_size_ = other.voxel_size_;
56  voxels_per_side_ = other.voxels_per_side_;
57  block_size_ = other.block_size_;
58  block_size_inv_ = other.block_size_inv_;
59 
60  for (const typename BlockHashMap::value_type& key_value_pair :
61  other.block_map_) {
62  const BlockIndex& block_idx = key_value_pair.first;
63  const typename BlockType::Ptr& block_ptr = key_value_pair.second;
64  CHECK(block_ptr);
65 
66  typename BlockType::Ptr new_block = allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_idx);
67  CHECK(new_block);
68 
69  for (size_t linear_idx = 0u; linear_idx < block_ptr->num_voxels();
70  ++linear_idx) {
71  const VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByLinearIndex(linear_idx);
72  VoxelType& new_voxel = new_block->getVoxelByLinearIndex(linear_idx);
73  new_voxel = voxel;
74  }
75  }
76 }
77 
78 template <typename VoxelType>
79 bool Layer<VoxelType>::saveToFile(const std::string& file_path,
80  bool clear_file) const {
81  constexpr bool kIncludeAllBlocks = true;
82  return saveSubsetToFile(file_path, BlockIndexList(), kIncludeAllBlocks,
83  clear_file);
84 }
85 
86 template <typename VoxelType>
87 bool Layer<VoxelType>::saveSubsetToFile(const std::string& file_path,
88  BlockIndexList blocks_to_include,
89  bool include_all_blocks,
90  bool clear_file) const {
91  CHECK_NE(getType().compare(voxel_types::kNotSerializable), 0)
92  << "The voxel type of this layer is not serializable!";
93 
94  CHECK(!file_path.empty());
95  std::fstream outfile;
96  // Will APPEND to the current file in case outputting multiple layers on the
97  // same file, depending on the flag.
98  std::ios_base::openmode file_flags = std::fstream::out | std::fstream::binary;
99  if (!clear_file) {
100  file_flags |= std::fstream::app | std::fstream::ate;
101  } else {
102  file_flags |= std::fstream::trunc;
103  }
104  outfile.open(file_path, file_flags);
105  if (!outfile.is_open()) {
106  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not open file for writing: " << file_path;
107  return false;
108  }
109 
110  // Only serialize the blocks if there are any.
111  // Count the number of blocks that need to be serialized.
112  size_t num_blocks_to_write = 0u;
113  if ((include_all_blocks && !block_map_.empty()) ||
114  !blocks_to_include.empty()) {
115  for (const BlockMapPair& pair : block_map_) {
116  bool write_block_to_file = include_all_blocks;
117 
118  if (!write_block_to_file) {
119  BlockIndexList::const_iterator it = std::find(
120  blocks_to_include.begin(), blocks_to_include.end(), pair.first);
121  if (it != blocks_to_include.end()) {
122  ++num_blocks_to_write;
123  }
124  } else {
125  ++num_blocks_to_write;
126  }
127  }
128  }
129  if (include_all_blocks) {
130  CHECK_EQ(num_blocks_to_write, block_map_.size());
131  } else {
132  CHECK_LE(num_blocks_to_write, block_map_.size());
133  CHECK_LE(num_blocks_to_write, blocks_to_include.size());
134  }
135 
136  // Write the total number of messages to the beginning of this file.
137  // One layer header and then all the block maps
138  const uint32_t num_messages = 1u + num_blocks_to_write;
139  if (!utils::writeProtoMsgCountToStream(num_messages, &outfile)) {
140  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not write message number to file.";
141  outfile.close();
142  return false;
143  }
144 
145  // Write out the layer header.
146  LayerProto proto_layer;
147  getProto(&proto_layer);
148  if (!utils::writeProtoMsgToStream(proto_layer, &outfile)) {
149  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not write layer header message.";
150  outfile.close();
151  return false;
152  }
153 
154  // Serialize blocks.
155  for (const BlockMapPair& pair : block_map_) {
156  bool write_block_to_file = include_all_blocks;
157  if (!write_block_to_file) {
158  BlockIndexList::const_iterator it = std::find(
159  blocks_to_include.begin(), blocks_to_include.end(), pair.first);
160  if (it != blocks_to_include.end()) {
161  write_block_to_file = true;
162  }
163  }
164  if (write_block_to_file) {
165  BlockProto block_proto;
166  pair.second->getProto(&block_proto);
167 
168  if (!utils::writeProtoMsgToStream(block_proto, &outfile)) {
169  LOG(ERROR) << "Could not write block message.";
170  outfile.close();
171  return false;
172  }
173  }
174  }
175  outfile.close();
176  return true;
177 }
178 
179 template <typename VoxelType>
180 bool Layer<VoxelType>::addBlockFromProto(const BlockProto& block_proto,
181  BlockMergingStrategy strategy) {
182  CHECK_NE(getType().compare(voxel_types::kNotSerializable), 0)
183  << "The voxel type of this layer is not serializable!";
184 
185  if (isCompatible(block_proto)) {
186  typename BlockType::Ptr block_ptr(new BlockType(block_proto));
187  const BlockIndex block_index = getGridIndexFromOriginPoint<BlockIndex>(
188  block_ptr->origin(), block_size_inv_);
189  switch (strategy) {
190  case BlockMergingStrategy::kProhibit:
191  CHECK_EQ(block_map_.count(block_index), 0u)
192  << "Block collision at index: " << block_index;
193  block_map_[block_index] = block_ptr;
194  break;
195  case BlockMergingStrategy::kReplace:
196  block_map_[block_index] = block_ptr;
197  break;
198  case BlockMergingStrategy::kDiscard:
199  block_map_.insert(std::make_pair(block_index, block_ptr));
200  break;
201  case BlockMergingStrategy::kMerge: {
202  typename BlockHashMap::iterator it = block_map_.find(block_index);
203  if (it == block_map_.end()) {
204  block_map_[block_index] = block_ptr;
205  } else {
206  it->second->mergeBlock(*block_ptr);
207  }
208  } break;
209  default:
210  LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown BlockMergingStrategy: "
211  << static_cast<int>(strategy);
212  return false;
213  }
214  // Mark that this block has been updated.
215  block_map_[block_index]->updated() = true;
216  } else {
217  LOG(ERROR)
218  << "The blocks from this protobuf are not compatible with this layer!";
219  return false;
220  }
221  return true;
222 }
223 
224 template <typename VoxelType>
225 bool Layer<VoxelType>::isCompatible(const LayerProto& layer_proto) const {
226  bool compatible = true;
227  compatible &= (std::fabs(layer_proto.voxel_size() - voxel_size_) <
228  std::numeric_limits<FloatingPoint>::epsilon());
229  compatible &= (layer_proto.voxels_per_side() == voxels_per_side_);
230  compatible &= (getType().compare(layer_proto.type()) == 0);
231 
232  if (!compatible) {
233  LOG(WARNING)
234  << "Voxel size of the loaded map is: " << layer_proto.voxel_size()
235  << " but the current map is: " << voxel_size_ << " check passed? "
236  << (std::fabs(layer_proto.voxel_size() - voxel_size_) <
237  std::numeric_limits<FloatingPoint>::epsilon())
238  << "\nVPS of the loaded map is: " << layer_proto.voxels_per_side()
239  << " but the current map is: " << voxels_per_side_ << " check passed? "
240  << (layer_proto.voxels_per_side() == voxels_per_side_)
241  << "\nLayer type of the loaded map is: " << getType()
242  << " but the current map is: " << layer_proto.type()
243  << " check passed? " << (getType().compare(layer_proto.type()) == 0)
244  << "\nAre the maps using the same floating-point type? "
245  << (layer_proto.voxel_size() == voxel_size_) << std::endl;
246  }
247  return compatible;
248 }
249 
250 template <typename VoxelType>
251 bool Layer<VoxelType>::isCompatible(const BlockProto& block_proto) const {
252  bool compatible = true;
253  compatible &= (std::fabs(block_proto.voxel_size() - voxel_size_) <
254  std::numeric_limits<FloatingPoint>::epsilon());
255  compatible &=
256  (block_proto.voxels_per_side() == static_cast<int>(voxels_per_side_));
257  return compatible;
258 }
259 
260 template <typename VoxelType>
261 size_t Layer<VoxelType>::getMemorySize() const {
262  size_t size = 0u;
263 
264  // Calculate size of members
265  size += sizeof(voxel_size_);
266  size += sizeof(voxels_per_side_);
267  size += sizeof(block_size_);
268  size += sizeof(block_size_inv_);
269 
270  // Calculate size of blocks
271  size_t num_blocks = getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks();
272  if (num_blocks > 0u) {
273  typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr block = block_map_.begin()->second;
274  size += num_blocks * block->getMemorySize();
275  }
276  return size;
277 }
278 
279 template <typename VoxelType>
280 std::string Layer<VoxelType>::getType() const {
281  return getVoxelType<VoxelType>();
282 }
